text:
April 6, 1955
Mr, Robert VanDuyn
Associate Director
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Bobs
Mighty sorry you cannot be with us in
Columbus but I am beginning to know what it is like
to be busy myself.
We will welcome your reaction to the
Tentative Research Proposal whenever you feel you
have had ample time.
Sincerely,
FESsjs
Frank E, Schooley
President
